entry.title: SQL 2008 Installation Fails: "Previous Release of Microsoft Visual Studio 2008"
entry.summary: I have been trying since yesterday to install the RTM of SQL 2008. But once I have selected the components to install I get a failure during the check of installation rules. The rule failing is “Previous releases of Microsoft Visual Studio 2008”. I have

entry.title: Visual Studio Testing: Code Coverage Property Window Crashes
entry.summary:
Problem: If you are using Visual Studio
Workaround: If your solution contains a project (not Silverlight Class Library, these are ok for some reason) or a WSSF
